name: Skijoring Granny
description:
You play as the dog pulling your elderly owner down a ski slope. She wanted to participate in the sport of Skijoring but she's not the most sprightly so it's up to you to keep her safe! Don't hit any obstacles!

Controls: Only left and right arrow keys, you can jump but you don't need it. "r" restarts the level and "esc" will exit.

Here's my build so far. The health isn't hooked up yet. Animations need to be added, as well as sound and menus at minimum I think.
